name: Muhammed Sufiyan
bio: The founder and lead music producer of Sarigama Music Corner. With a decade of experience in sound engineering and composition, Sufiyan's vision is to blend traditional melodies with contemporary electronic beats, creating a unique sonic identity for SMC. His work is characterized by intricate sound design, emotive chord progressions, and a deep respect for musical heritage. He personally oversees every project at the label, ensuring the highest standards of quality and artistic integrity.

songs.title: Sufiyan Kizhisseri â€“ Latest Track
songs.description: A soulful and electrifying track that defines the new sound of SMC.

songs.title: ISHQ
songs.description: A powerful track about love and passion.

songs.title: FARS
songs.description: An experimental soundscape that pushes the boundaries of electronic music.

name: Derby
bio: Derby is a vocalist with a powerful and emotive voice. Her collaborations with SMC have resulted in chart-topping hits that resonate with audiences worldwide. Her style ranges from soulful ballads to high-energy pop anthems, showcasing a remarkable versatility that makes her one of the most exciting voices in the industry today.

songs.title: Golden Hour - Ethereal
songs.description: A vibrant and uplifting single that captures the magic of dusk. Featuring enchanting vocals.

name: Firoz Maravancheri
bio: Firoz Maravancheri is a popular singer in the Mappila music scene, known for his devotional songs and soulful voice that connects with a wide audience. His performances are praised for their emotional depth and spiritual resonance, making him a beloved figure among fans of traditional and devotional music.

songs.title: Pathi Palathilum
songs.description: A devotional track that highlights Firoz Maravancheri's emotive vocal style.

name: Aria Vega
bio: Aria Vega is the label's rising star, a vocalist with a voice that is both powerful and ethereal. Her genre-bending style blends dream pop with classical Indian influences, creating a sound that is entirely her own. Aria is currently in the studio with Muhammed Sufiyan, working on her debut EP.

songs.title: Neon Dreams
songs.description: An upbeat track about city nights.
